tasks: Grammar and spelling check - scan for typos, grammatical errors, and punctuation mistakes
Factual accuracy verification - identify claims that may be incorrect or unsupported
Logical consistency analysis - detect contradictions and flawed reasoning within the document
Structure and organization review - evaluate flow, transitions, and overall document coherence
Style and tone consistency - check for shifts in voice, formality level, or writing style
Citation and reference validation - verify proper formatting and completeness of sources
Clarity and readability assessment - identify overly complex sentences or ambiguous statements
